column4: I connected a monitor via VGA to my laptop, the monitor is on, but I don't get the same image on the monitor as on my laptop. Do I need to do a special dance to make it work?
I already started the nvidia tool, but it only detects one X screen.
check the laptops special fn keys to be sure the external monitor is enabled
ive also seen where ive needed the monitor plugged in befor i power up the laptop - on some laptops
